document_data.name: Specialty Priest of Curna
document_data.mainbody: '''Specialty priests of Curna''' were worshipers of [[Curna]], known elsewhere as [[Oghma]], within [[Durpar]] in the [[Shining Lands]].
document_data.Culture: They were often employed by wealthy merchants, providing consultation to their benefactors whenever possible.
document_data.Abilities: These [[specialty priest]]s could [[turn undead]] like normal [[priest]]s. They ability to identify [[magic item]]s by sight became more adept as their skills developed. They could summon a blinding flash of light from their [[holy symbol]] once per day. The light would affect a single selected target and blind them until it was either magically dispelled or the priest removed the blindess by will.
document_data.Possessions: They were permitted to only wield blunt weapons. Any [[armor]] worn could not be metallic.
